tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: ********* ****** **** * ****** ********* *** ***** **********l took my 95 year old mother who had fallen down one day and then stopped walking and standing. Doctor got her X ray done and told us there was no fracture. He gave sufficient time to my mother  and advised us to make her walk somehow with human support and walker and cautioned us that unless that is done it may become miserable for her as well as us. We followed the advise and after about 5 days or so my mother started walking on her own after a gap of 3 weeks.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Rajeev performed surgery for knee replacement in both my knees and my experience has been great overall. He genuinely cares for his patients and looks after them. He kept in touch even after the surgery to make sure I was doing fine. He is very flexible in his approach and caters to the request of his patients. I would like to thank Dr. Rajeev from the bottom of my heart for his treatment.

** ***** ***** ** * **** **** ****** **** * **** **** ********* ** ******** ******* ** **********.
   I am thankful to him for his dedicated treatment and concentration over relief from bone related problems either related to surgery or medicine or physiotherapy problems.
  We are consulting him for bone fractured of my mother in law case, wife's cartilage related problems and Dr Verma resolved problems in very satisfactory way, appreciable *** * ****,** ** **** ****** ** *********** ** ******

I was  diagnosed by him  for extensor tendonitis  which  i got around 16 oct  then i was advised painkiller   crape bandage   and volini ice pack  it was  severe internal swelling   after 5 days on follow  up when i told my pain is not settled down he just told stop  painkiller *** **** ******** dnt get proper instruction   when to use crape bandage  or   just  told one sponge   ball exercise with  no  instruction   till when how many tym told for  hot packs     he dnt even  provide a prescription   in follow  up if pains take sos  but as  when i  started put  increasing work load   pain ups  severely   another dr which i  went after a month also  couldn't gve ryt treatment  my family  used to trust him blindly  years  thats what we did same in follow  up  too that he would always  tell  proper treatment initially i am still suffering  i  a mbbs student  my full work is writing  in dec 3 rd dr gve me ryt treatment  just with many strengthening exercises and ice pack was to be gven  for reducing inflammation  f**  *** *****  ********* * ********  *** ** **** **** ** **** ****** ******* ******* ** ***** ** ******** i am gving  my university exams  in pain  * *** ** *********  ****** ** *** ****  * ***** *** ** *** ************* *** *** *** *********  ** *** ** ***** ***** * ** *** ** ******* ***   *** *******   **  ***  **** *** ***** **** ** ****  **** ** *********  ****** ********   * *** ** **** ***** ****  ***  *** ***** *** ****

review:
Very friendly and spoke patiently , and  explained all .

I really appreciate and fearless to bring my 78 yrs old mom for her Hipjoint operation. 

Though today is my first day in Manipal , but am confident and proudly recommend Dr verma for anyone .
very good experience and highly recommend him for back ache and related issues. doctor listened patiently and guided well.
